anya-e1001n7:3: Avajātaṃ na icchanti, yo hoti kulagandhano.
anya-e1001n7:6: Bhato vā no bharissati, kiccaṃ vā no karissati.
anya-e1001n7:9: Atha vā pana petānaṃ, dakkhinaṃ anupadassati.
anya-e1001n7:11: Bahuputte pitā eko, avassaṃ poseti sadā;
anya-e1001n7:14: Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ duṭṭhu, anusāseyya no jahe;
anya-e1001n7:15: Kinnu chejjaṃ karaṃ pādaṃ, littaṃ asucinā siyā.
